description:
David Campey

https://2018.za.pycon.org/talks/78-teach-kids-7-17-to-code-with-python-coderdojo/

For the last 6 years (since pycon 2012) David's had a weekly class teaching kids to code. See what the first steps look like, get involved in a dojo!

title: Teach kids (7-17) to code with python & CoderDojo
